thread.title: TV | Life of Pi

author: Brian Lloyd
title: TV | Life of Pi
text: Ang Lee's gorgeously visual story about a young man who's adrift at sea with various animals might border on the schmaltzy and the cheesy in places, but the sheer level of design and wonder that goes into it is just incredible. It's little wonder it scooped several technical awards on its initial run. Definitely worth checking out if you haven't yet.
